extendedInfo.description: An easy way to bring with you a list of needs and feelings for use with the Non Violent Communication process (NVC). Explore combinations of needs and feelings, the program will assemble simple sentences for you using the selected needs and feelings. Also includes a reminder for how to deal with anger using the Non Violent Communication process. Needs and feelings (c) 2005 by Center for Nonviolent Communication Website: www.cnvc.org Email: cnvc@cnvc.org Phone: +1.505-244-4041

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Exactly what I wanted in an app. Thank u for meeting my need to practice NVC at work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Love the concept, needs updates though. Scrolling to the bottom is impossible in most circumstances, and some other glitches need improving.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mental Health Professional/Client Review
reviews.comment: Useful tool 4 multiple purposes. We tend 2 reduce emotions to a handful of generic words. Increase word choices & accuracy. Assign word 2 overwhelming feeling/need. Increase chance of being \"heard\" & understood.
reviews.author: A Google User
